body_content.explanation: showing or relating to a sexual interest in an object, or in a part of the body other than the sexual organs:
examples: Both women wore fetishistic black leather.
The stories are full of creepy details about her characters' fetishistic sex lives.

body_content.explanation: having so much interest in an activity or object that you spend an unreasonable amount of time thinking about it or doing it:
examples: Golfers are fetishistic about their equipment.
The movie is fetishistic in its attention to period detail.

body_content.explanation: worshipping an object that is believed to have a spirit or special magical powers; relating to this kind of worship:
examples: Christians had a fetishistic attachment to the bones of saints.
